Text: I always seed 3X.  You should ask other people to do that as well instead of just seeding "for a bit" afterward.  Even those who do listen won't be seeding enough to make it survive.  It's easy to get people to commit to set there tracker to seed upto 3X.  Also, thanks.
Will seed this 3-5 times!!! People don't know what they got til it's gone!!!! Ahhhh, Nostalgia...
